participant_1.background:
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.
I like to relax by looking through my antique collection.
I like to go on websites about cats and fashion.
i ride a unicycle.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.

participant_2.background:
I am passionate about creating comics and sharing my stories with the world.
I am so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home.
i work as a freelance accountant.
My back pain is a constant reminder of my old job as a mover.
i like to live off of the land.

content.text: Hi! I am interested in learning more about your blog.
Sure! My blog is about my life and my passion for creating comics.
That sounds really interesting. I love reading comics.
Me too! I have been reading them since I was a kid.
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.
I love Kindles! They are so convenient.
Me too! I can read books anywhere I want.
What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy novels.
I love historical fiction too! I have been reading a lot of historical fiction about the American Revolution lately.
That sounds really interesting. I have never read any historical fiction about the American Revolution.
You should check it out! It is really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
